ObjectType.purpose: Identify the type of object this is

ObjectVersion.purpose: Specify the version of the object for future reference and parsing

NetworkId.purpose: Identify the voting 'network' this proposal belongs to

ProposalId.purpose: Unique identifier (GUID) identifying this particular proposal

ProposalURL.purpose: Provide a URL where more information about the proposal may live (maybe a forum for discussing pros and cons, etc)

Title.purpose: The title of the ballot proposal

Description.purpose: Provide more information about this proposal including any references

items.purpose: Description text broken into 64-character strings to accomodate the maximum string length

Questions.purpose: Provide one or more ballot questions that voters will vote on.

VoteStartEpoch.purpose: Specify the Epoch that voting will start. Voting will be enabled at the beginning of this epoch.

VoteEndEpoch.purpose: Specify the Epoch that voting will end. Voting will be enabled until the end of this epoch.

SnapshotEpoch.purpose: Define which epoch snapshot will be used for weighting voting power.
